metadata.job: Prepare a literature review on GNNs in drug discovery

extracted_sections.text: A Gentle Introduction to Deep Learning for Graphs

sub_section_analysis.heading_title: A Gentle Introduction to Deep Learning for Graphs
sub_section_analysis.refined_text: the paper favors a consistent and progressive presentation of the main concepts and architectural aspects over an exposition of the most recent liter- ature . it takes a top-down view of the problem, introducing a generalized formulation of graph representation learning .

the paper is a tutorial introduction to the field of deep learn- ing for graphs . it favors a consistent and progressive presentation of the main concepts and architectural aspects over an exposition of the most recent liter- ature .
